text: In an effort to encourage students to continue higher studies, the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) Chariman, A.S. Kiran Kumar said that the graduates should pursue higher studies as it will help to achieve specialisations and provides opportunities in excelling in the professional life. Inaugurating the 24th convocation function at Dr. MGR Educational and Research Institute University here on Friday, Mr. Kumar said ISRO is planning to launch the Indian Regional Navigational Satellite System (IRNSS) – 1G soon. A series of earth observatories like GSLV Mark –2 and Mark – 3 will be launched later this year.
title: ‘Pursue higher studies to better career’
